bibliography:
Alchourrón, C.E., P. Gärdenfors, and D. Makinson,
1985, “On the Logic of Theory Change: Partial Meet Contraction
and Revision Functions”, Journal of Symbolic Logic, 50:
510–530.

   [The starting-point for all
subsequent studies of belief revision.]

Alchourrón, C.E. and D. Makinson, 1981, “Hierarchies
of Regulation and Their Logic”, in R. Hilpinen (ed.), New
Studies in Deontic Logic, Dordrecht: D. Reidel Publishing
Company, pp. 125–148.

of theory change: Contraction functions and their associated revision

Cantwell, J., 1997, “On the logic of small changes in
hypertheories”, Theoria, 63: 54–89.

–––, 1999, “Some logics of iterated
revision”, Studia Logica, 7: 49–84.

de Rijke, M., 1994, “Meeting some neighbours”, in J.

–––, 2011, “AGM 25 years. Twenty-Five

–––, 2003, “Ten Philosophical Problems in
